text: George Hedworth Darwin (16 May 1932 â€“ June 2019) was an English professional footballer. He played as an inside forward. Darwin was born in Chester-le- Street. He played for Kimblesworth Juniors, Huddersfield Town, Mansfield Town, Derby County, Rotherham United, Barrow and Boston during the 1950s and 1960s. He died in 2019, at the age of 87. ==References== Category:1932 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Derby County F.C. players Category:English footballers Category:Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players Category:Sportspeople from County Durham
title: George Darwin (footballer)
